pages.text: $(#008cff)The Moon temple$() can be found floating in the sky, they always spawn along the X and Z axis, same as the $(#008cff)The Runestone Dungeon$(). It has a small path leading up to the entrance and is home to $(#8800ff)The Moon Queen$()!$(br2)Around the temple you can find floating islands that contain $(#008cff)Moongems$() that are important for many recipes.

pages.title: Dark Amulet
pages.text: $(#8800ff)The Moon Queen$() drops $(#008cff)The Dark Amulet$() which is used to gain access to the next dungeon.$(br2)$(#008cff)The Moontemples$() interior has two towers. At the top of each tower you can find a $(#008cff)Moon Temple Cell Key Fragment$().

pages.title: Moon Temple Cell Key
pages.text: After clearing each side and obtaining both fragments, you can craft the key with a $(#008cff)Moongem$(). Now you can access the boss room!
